newsitem.title: POLAND: BIG bank cuts credit, deposit rates.
newsitem.headline: BIG bank cuts credit, deposit rates.

text.p: Poland's BIG Bank SA will lower most of its deposit rates by about 1.25 points and cut credit rates by about two points from September 5, the bank said.
It said in a statement the new one-month deposit rate was 16.75 percent, down from 18.00 percent and the three-month rate was 18.25 percent, from 19.50 percent.
Call deposit rates will be unchanged at eight percent.
One-month credit rates for enterprises were cut to 21.50 percent from 23.50 percent and three-month credit rates to 23.50 percent, from 25.50 percent.
